DOC.brief_summary: This non-randomized , post-approval study evaluate rate post-operative Cerebral Spinal Fluid ( CSF ) leak subject undergo spinal procedure receive DuraSeal Exact Spine Sealant System .
DOC.brief_title: DuraSeal Exact Spine Sealant System Post-Approval Study
DOC.criteria: Subject 18 year age old Subject spinal procedure dural opening ( either intentional incidental ) occur treat either : DuraSeal™ Exact Spine Sealant ( DuraSeal™ Sealant group ONLY ) OR Any method seal dura exception DuraSeal™ Sealant either spinal cranial . ( Control group ONLY ) Subject , authorize representative , informed nature study provide write informed consent approve appropriate Institutional Review Board ( IRB ) respective clinical site prior collection study data . Prospective subject : Consent must obtain within 24 hour surgery stop time . Retrospective subject ( Control group specific ) : IRB approval may grant individual site waive requirement inform consent . The investigator determine subject able comply require followup visit ( require subject enrol retrospectively control group ONLY ) Pregnant breastfeed female ( document medical record ; test beyond site 's standard care require )
